thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Linda GROCOCK

author: Linda GROCOCK
title: Linda GROCOCK
text: This trusted seller kept me informed every step of the way from paying for my item to recieving it. When my item came it was very safely packaged and a very fast delivery. The item I bought is of the absolute best quality and you can ve certain I will shop again with these guys. Great all round.
